# Abstract

Here we will reproduce the famous plot from Oeppen and Vaupel (2002).

# Analysis

Here we begin the analysis.

```{r}
library(gapminder)
library(tidyverse)
view(gapminder_unfiltered)
new<-gapminder_unfiltered %>%
  group_by(year) %>%
  filter(lifeExp==max(lifeExp)) %>%
  arrange(year)
view(new)

```
